solution_line_template: In one week, he bakes {apple_pie_days} * {pies_per_day} = <<{apple_pie_days}*{pies_per_day}={apple_pies_per_week}>>{apple_pies_per_week} apple pies.
In one week, he bakes {cherry_pie_days} * {pies_per_day} = <<{cherry_pie_days}*{pies_per_day}={cherry_pies_per_week}>>{cherry_pies_per_week} cherry pies.
